trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the aberrant biter regains 10 hit points if it has at least 1 hit point, and it grows a different kind of natural armor on its skin. Roll a {@dice d3}. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn.
1. The biter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
2. The biter's AC increases by 5.
3. The first time the biter takes any damage, the damage it takes is reduced to 0.
If the aberrant biter is in an anti-magic field, has been targeted by the dispel magic spell, or been exposed to the Nigriit substance, it loses the effects of this trait for 1 minute.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aberrant biter can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Phagic Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a success. On a failure, the target is also infected by an aberrant phagic affliction. While afflicted, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a success, the affliction ends. On a failure, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mystic's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the aberrant mystic regains 10 hit points if it has at least 1 hit point, and it grows a different kind of natural armor on its skin. Roll a {@dice d3}. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn.
1. The mystic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
2. The mystic's AC increases by 5.
3. The first time the mystic takes any damage, the damage it takes is reduced to 0.
If the aberrant mystic is in an anti-magic field, has been targeted by the dispel magic spell, or been exposed to the Nigriit substance, it loses the effects of this trait for 1 minute.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aberrant mystic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Mind Meld
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., two targets. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) psychic damage. If the attack misses both targets, errant psychic energy lashes out to all nearby creatures. Every creature within 5 feet of the mystic, including itself, takes 5 psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Lance
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 6d8 + 4}) psychic damage. If the attack misses, the mystic takes 5 psychic damage.

bonus.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The mystic teleports to a space it can see within 60 feet of it. Every creature that can see it teleport must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, or take 5 psychic damage.

reaction.name: Mind Push
entries: When the mystic sees a creature within 60 feet of it succeed or fail on a saving throw, it can push its mind towards failure or success. The creature must reroll its saving throw. If the result of the roll remains the same, the mystic takes 5 psychic damage. If the result of the roll is reversed, the mystic can recharge its teleport ability or regain the use of its reaction.

trait.name: Distant Invisibility
entries: The aberrant ram is {@condition invisible} to any creature that is further away than 30 feet from it.

trait.name: Ramming Charge
entries: If the abberant ram moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 2d12}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the ram and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the aberrant ram regains 10 hit points if it has at least 1 hit point, and it grows a different kind of natural armor on its skin. Roll a {@dice d3}. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn.
1. The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
2. The ram's AC increases by 5.
3. The first time the ram takes any damage, the damage it takes is reduced to 0.
If the aberrant ram is in an anti-magic field, has been targeted by the dispel magic spell, or been exposed to the Nigriit substance, it loses the effects of this trait for 1 minute.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the aberrant ram can high jump up to 30 feet.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aberrant ram can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Aberrant Screamer

trait.name: Adaptive Armor
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the aberrant screamer regains 10 hit points if it has at least 1 hit point, and it grows a different kind of natural armor on its skin. Roll a {@dice d3}. The effect lasts until the end of its next turn.
1. The screamer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
2. The screamer's AC increases by 5.
3. The first time the screamer takes any damage, the damage it takes is reduced to 0.
If the aberrant screamer is in an anti-magic field, has been targeted by the dispel magic spell, or been exposed to the Nigriit substance, it loses the effects of this trait for 1 minute.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The aberrant screamer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actionHeader: The aberrant screamer makes a bite attack and a tail attack. It can't target the same creature with both attacks.

action.name: Bloody Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) piercing damage, and the creature can't regain any hit points until the start of the screamer's next turn. If the attack reduces a creature to 0, the screamer can choose to activate its Adaptive Armor.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Malicious Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The aberrant screamer lets out a high-pitched howl of terror, directing violent sonic vibrations in a 30-foot cone. Any creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage, taking half as much damage on a success. If a creature fails its saving throw by 10 or more, it also takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and it is afflicted by the effects of the confusion spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aeromancer's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can cast the following spells:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aeromancer makes three wind blast attacks. If all attacks hit a single target, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
Alternatively, the aeromancer can make two wind blast attacks and cast one of her spells, or move an existing whirlwind up to 30 feet in any direction along the ground.

action.name: Wind Blast
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the aeromancer.

action.name: Whirlwind (Concentration) (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The aeromancer creates a howling whirlwind in a 10-foot-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder centered on a point on the ground within 300 feet of her. When a creature first enters or starts its turn in the area of the whirlwind, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) bludgeoning damage, or half as much damage on a success. On a failure, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind.

When a {@condition restrained} creature begins its turn inside the whirlwind, it is pulled 5 feet higher inside it, unless it is already at the top. A {@condition restrained} creature moves with the whirlwind and falls when the effect ends.

bonus.name: Repellent Field (Concentration)
entries: The aeromancer summons strong winds that surround her for 1 minute or until {@status concentration} is broken. Any creatures within 10 feet of her must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take 15 ({@dice 2d10 + 4}) and be pushed 10 feet away from the aeromancer. For the duration, any creature that steps inside the area of the maelstrom must make the same saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The angel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Divine Curse
entries: The Alten angel is slowly dying, after being severed from from the font of divine energy. The angel has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws, and its speed is halved if it is below half its maximum hit points.

Its skin has turned black and withered, giving it a terrifying appearance. When a creature sees the angel for the first time, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute, or until it succeeds on the repeating saving throw.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The alten angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The angel makes two attacks

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Cursed Touch (3/Day)
entries: The angel touches another creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, or it becomes {@condition blinded} (1), slowed (2), enfeebled (3) or cursed (4), as per the bestow curse spell for 1 hour.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The angel magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the angel's choice).

In a new form, the angel retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

Having put the seed of individuality into the mind of the celestials serving Bahamut in the material plane, Pheadran watched as they began to have opinions of their own. When they beseeched their Father with their requests and demands that they should no longer sit idly by while demagogues trick and manipulate humans into their schemes, corrupting them. After declining, Bahamut noticed how these angels had become capable of questioning his orders, instead of mechanically carrying them out, and he went to pull the plug on them. Phaedran intervened, preserving them. After surviving on the whispers, and with the divine plug pulled from them, they turned away from Bahamut, who had tried to terminate them.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The alyssan and its rider can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Ice Affinity
entries: When the alyssan takes cold damage, it and its rider can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} cold damage with the next attack each of them makes within the next minute.

action.name: Icy Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Cold Step {@recharge 5}
entries: The alyssan and its rider teleport to a space that the alyssan can see within 30 feet of it. Each creature within 5 feet of it before it teleports must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be encased in ice and have their speed reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The aurelian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Duplicitous Mirage
entries: When the aurelian ends its turn, it can create an illusory version of itself at a point it can see within 30 feet of it. The aurelian then has a 50% chance of instantly switching places with its illusory counterpart, in a way that isn't immediately noticeable. A creature that uses its action to examine the duplicate can determine that it is an illusion with a successful {@dc 13} Intelligence (Investigation) check.

The illusory aurelian behaves independently, but similarly to the real one in every way, including believable sounds and movements. The illusory duplicate lasts until it takes any damage, or until a creature puts anything physical through it, such as its hand or foot, showing it to be an illusion. At that point, that creature takes 5 psychic damage as the illusion laughs at it mockingly before disappearing. The aurelian can have up to 5 duplicates active at the same time.

action.name: Tinsy Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, or it becomes {@condition charmed} by the aurelian for 1 minute, or until it takes any damage by it or its allies.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Prismatic Tail {@recharge 4}
entries: The aurelian produces a spray of prismatic colors with its tail, flashing intense light in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage, taking half as much damage on a success. On a failure, a creature is also under the effects of the confusion spell until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Blind
entries: The bellman is {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Death Toll
entries: When the bellman dies, its bell tolls. The creature that killed it makes its saving throw with disadvantage and takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Bell Toll
entries: The bellman tolls its bell. Each creature that isn't another bellman within 30 feet must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is shocked for 1 minute. A shocked creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and can't take any reactions. When a shocked creature hears this bell toll again, it automatically takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage. A shocked creature can make another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that has the shocked condition end on it is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Bellsense
entries: The bellman perceives its environment through sonar input delivered to its bell. The bell has hit points equal to the martial artist's, an AC of 18, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. If the bell takes bludgeoning damage, the martial artist takes the same damage. If the bell is destroyed, the martial artist becomes {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Death Toll
entries: When the bellman dies, its bell tolls. The creature that killed it makes its saving throw with disadvantage and takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Bellman's Advantage
entries: The martial artist has advantage on attack rolls against shocked creatures, and scores a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 with its attacks against them.

If the bellman hits a shocked creature with two unarmed strikes during its turn, or scores a critical hit against it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or it becomes {@condition stunned} until the start of the bellman's next turn.

trait.name: Bell's Resonance
entries: Each time the bellman is hit by an attack, the bell reverberates slightly. Each shocked creature within 30 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bellman makes two unarmed strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Bell Toll
entries: The bellman tolls its bell. Each creature that isn't another bellman within 30 feet must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is shocked for 1 minute. A shocked creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and can't take any reactions. Additionally, its speed is 0. When a shocked creature hears this bell toll again, it automatically takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. A shocked creature can make another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that has the shocked effect end on it is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The black hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Scruff-Ready
entries: The black hound has advantage on initiative checks. Additionally, it only needs to spend 5 feet of its movement to get up from the {@condition prone} condition.
Additionally, the hound has a keeper that it protects. It has advantage on attack rolls against creatures within 5 feet of its keeper.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The hound can also grapple the target. If a creature is smaller than the hound, it doesn't expend any additional movement when dragging it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bladesinger's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}). It can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Weave of the Song
entries: The bladesinger's attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20. When it scores a critical hit, the bladesinger recharges its blade step and can immediately use it even if it has already expended its bonus action.
Alternatively, the bladesinger can choose to recharge its counterspelling strike.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bladesinger makes two singing rapier attacks.

action.name: Singing Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) force damage.

bonus.name: Blade Step {@recharge 4}
entries: The bladesinger teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. It can make a melee attack against a target within reach either before or after teleporting. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

reaction.name: Counterspelling Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the bladesinger begins casting a spell, the bladesinger can use its reaction to make a singing rapier attack. On a hit, the target has to make a Concentration check. On a failure, the casting of the spell fails.

monster.name: Blood Fiend

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the blood fiend can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Blood Lust
entries: If the blood fiend has less than half of its maximum hit points, when it hits a creature with an attack, it regains 5 hit points.

When the blood fiend starts its turn with less than half of its maximum hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or activate its reckless trait. When the blood fiend activates its reckless trait in this way, it must use its action to make as many attacks as it can towards its nearest enemy.

trait.name: Clawed Creation
entries: The blood fiend has 4 clawed arms. When a creature targets the blood fiend with an attack, it can choose to target one of its arms instead. Each arm has 30 hit points and an AC equal to the blood fiend's AC. If an arm is reduced to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and the blood fiend can't attack with it. In addition, the blood fiend's AC is reduced by 1.

actionHeader: The blood fiend makes a number of attacks equal to the number of arms it has, normally 4.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the boitatá must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. A creature that is {@condition restrained} by the boitatá has disadvantage on this saving throw. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the boitatá's stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The boitatá can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The boitatá makes a bite attack and a constrict attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage or 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage if the creature is {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The boitatá exhales poison in a 30-foot cone in a direction of its choice. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage, or half as much damage on a success. On a failure, the creature is also {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Relentless
entries: If the boar takes 20 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead. When it does so, its AC increases by 1 and it can instantly use its Bristling Entanglement.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition restrained}, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

bonus.name: Bristling Entanglement {@recharge 5}
entries: Vines spread forth from the boar's mouth and fur, covering the ground in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained} by the entangling vines. The vines remain for 1 minute or until the boar uses this ability again. If the boar moves, it drags along any {@condition restrained} creatures as if it was grappling them.

trait.name: Book Sense
entries: The candleworm has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell. Additionally, the candleworm can pinpoint, by scent, the location of books within 60 feet of it. It can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

Additionally, the candleworm has 5 candles attached to it, and sheds dim light within 20 feet of it while at least one of them is lit. Any creature in that area is unable to read any writing (or use a spell scroll) while under this light.

trait.name: Wordworm Curse
entries: When the candleworm hits a creature that it is attached to with a bite attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become cursed until targeted by a remove curse spell or greater magic. While cursed, a creature takes 10 psychic damage for each hour it spends reading. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to the effect for 1 hour.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the worm attaches itself on the target until releases its grip (no action required) or a creature uses its action to succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength check made to remove it. While attached to a creature, the target's speed is reduced to half.

action.name: Snuff Candle {@recharge 5}
entries: The candleworm snuffs one of its candles (chosen or randomly determined by the DM), if it has one or more of them lit. Roll {@dice 1d6} to determine the candle.

1. Darkness. The area within 20 feet of the candleworm is surrounded by magical darkness for 1 hour. If any of this area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled. A creature holding one of the candleworm's candles can see through this darkness.

2. Lung Killer. Smoke from the snuffed candle fills the area within 20 feet of the candleworm for 1 minute. Any creature in the area is unable to speak as it coughs uncontrollably. A creature that attempts to cast a spell with a verbal component while in the area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, or the casting fails and the spell slot is wasted.
3. Cursed Wax. Any creatures within 20 feet of the worm when the candle is snuffed must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or come under the effects of the bestow curse spell.

4. Lightless Cold. Any creatures within 20 feet of the worm must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. Any light or flame created by a 3rd or lower level spell are snuffed out.

5. Life Drain. Any creature within 20 feet of the candleworm must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. A creature that fails its saving throw also has its maximum hit points reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.
6. The candleworm can select the candle that is snuffed and can choose to either deal double damage with it, or force each target to make any saving throws imposed by the effect with disadvantage.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: Opportunity attacks and grapple checks against the causticsaur are made with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The causticsaur makes two attacks, one with its claws and one with its launch acid.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Launch Acid
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., two targets within 5 feet of each other. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The causticsaur spews acid in a 15-foot cone. Any creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Acidic Spew
entries: The causticsaur uses its reaction to spew acid at an attacker within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage, taking half as much damage on a success. On a failure, the attack misses and the causticsaur can move up to its speed without provoking any attacks of opportunity.
The causticsaur must have the Acid Spray ability charged in order to use this reaction, and doing so expends that ability's charge.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The paladin's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). They can cast the following spells without requiring any material components:

trait.name: Celestial Aura
entries: The paladin and any allies within 30 feet of them have advantage on all saving throws and are immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions. Additionally, affected creatures gain 10 temporary hit points if they begin their turn inside the aura.
If the paladin takes 25 or more necrotic damage from a single source, the aura becomes deactivated for 1 round. The aura also can't be active if the paladin is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paladin makes two attacks with their longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Burst of Light {@recharge 5}
entries: The paladin emits a burst of light from their shield in a 60-foot cone. Any creatures within the area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition blinded} for 1 minute or until it succeeds on a repeated saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

bonus.name: Surge of Vitality {@recharge 5}
entries: The paladin uses its bonus action to cause a creature it can see within 30 feet of it to regain 14 ({@dice 4d6}) hit points.

bonus.name: Radiant Shield {@recharge 5}
entries: The paladin raises his shield. One creature they can see within 30 feet of them gains a +2 bonus to its AC and sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius until the start of the paladin's next turn. A creature that hits the target with a melee attack while the shield is active, it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage once per turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The paladin makes a longsword attack. On a hit, the paladin can expend an additional legendary action to cause the creature to become {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The paladin moves up to its speed. A creature that makes an attack of opportunity against them takes 10 radiant damage.

legendary.name: Greater Restoration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The paladin or a willing creature it touches gains the effects of the greater restoration spell.

trait.name: Aura of Wispy Light
entries: The chainlight spirit emits an aura in a 5-foot radius around it. Any creature that is not undead and starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage and have its hit point maximum reduced by an equal amount. The chainlight spirit then increases its current and maximum hit points by the same amount.

trait.name: Chains
entries: The chainlight spirit has an unlimited number of chains it can use to attack and grapple creatures around it. Each chain can be targeted seperately and has an AC of 18, 20 hit points, and immunity to psychic, poison and necrotic damage.
The chainlight spirit can drag a creature it has {@condition grappled} with its chains by spending movement. It spends 2 feet of movement for each foot it drags a creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chainlight spirit makes two chain attacks.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). A creature that is not undead must also succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, or have its Constitution score reduced by {@dice 1d3}. On a failure, the radius of the spirit's aura also increases by 5 feet.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The corrupted worg has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell. Additionally, it can smell humanoid blood within 120 feet of it.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The corrupted worg has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the corrupted worg's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, roll {@dice 1d4}:
1. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage, and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn.
2. The target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.
3. The target has must use its action to Attack during its next turn, moving until it is within reach if necessary. If no available target is nearby, it loses its action.
4. The target is cursed. While cursed, its melee attacks deal 1 extra necrotic damage. Once per day, it can cause a creature it has hit with a melee attack to make the same saving throw.

action.name: Howl
entries: Any creatures of the worg's choice within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or come under the effects of the fear spell for 1 minute. If a creature hears the howling of more than 3 worgs, and the howling comes from all surrounding directions, the creature has disadvantage on the save. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the effects of the howl for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The corrupted worg has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell. Additionally, it can smell humanoid blood within 300 feet of it.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The corrupted worg has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the corrupted worg's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, roll {@dice 1d4}:
1. The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn.
2. The target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.
3. The target has must use its action to Attack during its next turn, moving until it is within reach if necessary. If no available target is nearby, it loses its action.
4. The target is cursed. While cursed, its melee attacks deal 1 extra necrotic damage. Once per day, it can cause a creature it has hit with a melee attack to make the same saving throw.

action.name: Howl (Legendary Action - 1/day)
entries: Any creatures of the worg's choice within 60 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or come under the effects of the fear spell for 1 minute. If a creature hears the howling of more than 3 worgs, and the howling comes from all surrounding directions, the creature has disadvantage on the save. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the effects of the howl for 1 hour.
When used as a legendary action, any allies of the worg elder can also howl in response.

bonus.name: Pack Attack {@recharge 5}
entries: The worg elder uses its bonus action to allow a worg ally to make an attack. The ally and the elder must both be within 5 feet of the target.

reaction.name: Corrupted Perseverence
entries: When the worg would be reduced to 0 hit points, it can use its reaction to make a Constitution saving throw. The DC is equal to 10 or half of the damage dealt, whichever value is higher. On a success, the worg is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The corrupted worg has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell. Additionally, it can smell humanoid blood within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, roll {@dice 1d4}:
1. The target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage, and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn.
2. The target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.
3. The target has must use its action to Attack during its next turn, moving until it is within reach if necessary. If no available target is nearby, it loses its action.
4. The target is cursed. While cursed, its melee attacks deal 1 extra necrotic damage. Once per day, it can cause a creature it has hit with a melee attack to make the same saving throw.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: The sand devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that target an area of effect. Additionally, the sand devil takes half damage from such effects.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: The crimson sand devil has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The crimson sand devil doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach. It also doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity if it burrows into sand.

action.name: Nose Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 8d4}) fire damage on a failure or half as much damage on a success. On a failure, a creature is also {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned}, a creature must make the same saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a failure, it takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) fire damage. On a success, the effect ends.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Cryomancer's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). They can cast the following spells:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cryomancer makes three Ice Blast attacks. Alternatively, he casts one of his spells, or uses his Ice Crystalline Formation, and makes one Ice Blast attack.

action.name: Ice Blast
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) cold damage and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. This effect is cumulative. If a creature's speed is reduced to 0 as a result of this effect, it becomes {@condition restrained} for the duration, as it is encased in ice.

action.name: Ice-Crystalline Formation {@recharge 5}
entries: The cryomancer draws moisture out of the air in a 40-foot cube. Any creatures in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) cold damage, or half as much damage on a success. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition restrained} for 1 minute, as it becomes encased in ice. To free the target, a creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check. The DC becomes 15 if the creature uses fire in its attempt to free the creature.

bonus.name: Armor of Agathys {@recharge 5}
entries: The cryomancer casts Armor of Agathys on themselves or another creature they can touch. The target gains 30 hit points from the casting of the spell. The cryomancer can't have two instances of this spell active at the same time, and they can't target the same creature again with this feature until they complete a long rest.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The cursed hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Cursed Aura
entries: Any creature that attacks the cursed hound while within 5 feet of it does so with disadvantage. Additionally, creatures within 5 feet of a cursed hound have a -2 bonus to their AC. Creatures that are immune to being cursed are unaffected.

trait.name: Cursed Bites
entries: A creature bitten by the hound is unable to regain hit points until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hound makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The hound can also grapple the target.

action.name: Cursed Howl (1/day)
entries: The hound lets out a cursed howl. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage and become cursed for 1 minute. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes the same damage but isn't cursed. A cursed creature has disadvantage on all attack rolls and saving throws, and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the curse ends.

trait.name: Attention Magnet (Magnetism)
entries: If a creature that is concentrating on a spell starts its turn within 5 feet of the cyber spirit, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Concentration check or lose its concentration. In addition, any creature that makes a Concentration check because of the cyber spirit does so with disadvantage.

trait.name: From Nowhere (1/Turn) (Misinformation)
entries: When the cyber spirit hits a creature with an attack, it can choose to become {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn. The invisibility ends if the spirit makes an attack.

trait.name: Anchored (Stability)
entries: Your concentration can't be broken while the spirit is alive.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyber spirit makes one attack.

action.name: Info Flood
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + 3}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dark pixy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Twisted Mind
entries: The dark pixy has advantage on saving throws against becoming {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. If she would already have advantage on such a saving throw, she also gains a +5 to her save as well.

Additionally, when a creature attempts to access the dark pixy's mind, such as with the detect thoughts spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of her for 1 minute.

trait.name: Fear Sense
entries: The dark pixy can sense the presence and location of any {@condition frightened} creature within 60 feet of her even if it is {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The dark pixy makes {@dice 1d3} claw attacks. She can substitute up to one of those attacks with her invoke fright.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. A {@condition frightened} creature takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage on a hit.

action.name: Invoke Fright {@recharge 5}
entries: The dark pixy targets up to 6 creatures she can see within 60 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the pixy for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success.

bonus.name: Twist Mind
entries: The dark pixy twists the mind of a {@condition frightened} creature within 60 feet of her, driving it even further towards the brink. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deathswod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Adapting Resilience
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the deathswod can choose a damage type: bludgeoning, slashing or piercing. Until the start of its next turn, it has resistance to damage of that type. The deathswod is considered to be concentrating on this effect.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the deathswod to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the deathswod drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Impervious Skin
entries: When the deathswod takes damage, it can make a Constitution check. If the number it rolls is higher than the damage it is dealt, it takes no damage instead. On a failed saving throw, the deathswod can't use this ability again until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Multiple Arms
entries: When a creature hits the deathswod with a critical hit, it can choose to chop off one of its arms instead of deal additional damage, unless the deathswod only has 1 arm remaining.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathswod makes two attacks. Roll {@dice 1d4} for each attack to determine its type.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or the deathswod decapitates it, killing it instantly.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled}. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by the chain, the deathswod can knock it {@condition prone} and drag it up to 15 feet towards it when it takes this action.

action.name: Mek'Leth
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target gains a bleeding wound until it receives magical healing or a creature uses its action to succeed on a {@dc 15} medicine check. At the start of each of its turns, a bleeding creature takes {@damage 1d4} damage. Each time a creature rolls the maximum value on this die, it upgrades to the next die on the scale (e.g. {@dice 1d4} to {@dice 1d6}), up to {@dice 1d12}.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the deathswod roll an 8 in the damage, its mace impacts the creature's legs, reducing its speed by half until it takes a short or long rest. If the deathswod rolls two eights, it reduces the target's speed to 0 instead as it completely crashes its legs.

reaction.name: Stubborn
entries: When the deathswod fails a saving throw, it can choose to use its reaction to reroll the result. It can reroll as many times as it wants as part of the same reaction. Each time it does so, it takes 10 damage, which can't be modified, reduced or prevented in any way.

legendary.name: Reroll
entries: The deathsword can expend 1 legendary action at any point whenever it attacks or damages a creature in order to reroll 1 damage die, or reroll an attack roll.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The deathswod makes an attack, roll {@dice 1d4} to determine its type. It can move up to half of its movement speed before or after it makes the attack.

legendary.name: Bellowing Roar (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The deathswod lets out a terrifying roar full of rage. Each creature within 30 feet of the deathswod that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute, repeating the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.
The next attack that the deathswod makes becomes a critical hit if it hits.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deep siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep siren can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The siren makes one claw attack and one stupefying touch attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes.

action.name: Stupefying Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Siren's Song
entries: The siren begins singing. Any creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by the siren. While {@condition charmed}, the creatures must use their whole turn to follow the siren wherever she goes. The effect lasts until dispelled ({@dc 15}). If a {@condition charmed} creature takes damage, it can repeat the Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Blood Hallowing (1/Turn)
entries: Once per turn, the demonic crusher can cause a willing allied creature within 30 feet of it to lose 10 hit points. As a result, it gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its turn, and its attacks deal an extra 5 damage.

trait.name: Violent Attacks
entries: The demonic crusher scores a critical hit with its attacks on a a roll of 19-20 on the {@dice d20}.

trait.name: Bloodthirsty Charge
entries: If the demonic crusher moves in a straight line towards an enemy, it can take the dash action as a bonus action. When it does so, its jump distance is tripled, and the first creature it hits with an attack on its turn must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is knocked 10 feet away from the crusher and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demonic crusher makes three fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Abyssal Aura
entries: The demonic oathkeeper radiates an aura of infernal influence. Any ally within the aura has advantage on saving throws, and demons gain 10 temporary hit points if they are in the aura at the start of their turn.
Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Blood Sacrifice (1/Turn)
entries: The oathkeeper can choose to lose 20 hit points in order to deal an extra 20 necrotic damage when it hits a creature with an attack. If the creature dies as a result of the attack, it regains these hit points.
If the oathkeeper dies as a result of the hit points it loses, it transforms into a demon instantly. It is {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oathkeeper makes two Abyssal Iron attacks.

action.name: Abyssal Iron
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Abyssal Fire
entries: The oathkeeper lifts its sword and call down abyssal fire on a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw, or take 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) fire damage and have its movement speed reduced until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The demonic priest's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Abyssal Agency
entries: The demonic priest is immune to spells that would control his actions magically, such as the hold person, dominate person, or command spells.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The priest uses its abyssal censer and casts a spell, or attacks with its censer twice.

action.name: Abyssal Censer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

If the attack hits, it creates a cloud of abyssal steam which hangs in the air in a 5-foot radius sphere for the next minute. A creature that starts its turn in the area takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Tiefling Blood
entries: When the priest takes damage, it can use its reaction to force its attacker to make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, or half as much damage on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dreadfast demon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can cast the following spells:

5: {@spell dominate person} (a frightened creature has disadvantage on the save)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dreadfast demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Frightful Opressor
entries: The dreadfast demon has advantage on attack rolls against {@condition frightened} creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreadfast demon makes two attacks. It can substitute one of those attacks with its dreadful glare.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The dreadfast demon targets a creature within 120 feet of it, which must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. On a failure, the dreadfast demon targets another creature within range with the same glare.

reaction.name: Deceitful Reflection
entries: When the dreadfast demon succeeds on a saving throw against an effect that targets only it, it can use its reaction to mess with the caster's mind, causing them to think they have mistakenly cast the spell on themselves. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or suffer the effects of the spell. A {@condition frightened} creature automatically fails the saving throw.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The dreadfast demon makes a claw attack. If it hits a {@condition frightened} creature, it is a critical hit.

legendary.name: Wail of the Frightful Harvest (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dreadfast demon causes intense pain in the mind of all {@condition frightened} creatures within 90 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw, taking 34 ({@damage 8d8}) psychic damage on a failure or half as much damage on a success.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dreadfast demon casts a spell.

trait.name: Evasive Flyer
entries: The drone has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that target it specifically (instead of an area of effect). In addition, the drone doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity when it flies out of a creature's reach.

trait.name: Reactive Shooter
entries: The drone has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are unable to take any reactions.

action.name: Energy Beam
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) force damage. If the drone deals max damage or scores a critical hit, the target is also unable to take any reactions until the start of its next turn on a failed {@dc 13} Constitution save.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The duke's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). It can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Mace of Vile Disruption
entries: The duke wields a corrupted mace of disruption. At any point, he can choose to have it shed an aura of magical darkness in a 20-foot radius sphere around him. Fiends can see through this magical darkness.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the duke of disruption's darkvision.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duke makes two attacks.

action.name: Mace of Vile Disruption
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage. On a hit, if the target is left with less than 30 hit points, it must succeed on a death saving throw or die. On a successful save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the duke until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Launch Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The duke teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet. If that place is in complete darkness, no charge is consumed or needed for the use of this ability.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke
entries: When the duke is damaged by a creature he can see within 60 feet of him, he can use his reaction to damn it to hell. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage, as it is surrounded by infernal flame. After doing so, the duke can choose to use his teleport ability at the expense of a charge.

This damage ignores resistance and immunity to fire damage, unless it is granted by a feature that specifically grants resistance or immunity to infernal fire. A creature that fails this saving throw is also cursed for the next minute. While cursed, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the duke. Only one creature may be cursed in this way at a time.
The duke wield a corrupted mace of disruption (requires attunement by a fiend) and he can also grant a charm of hellish rebuke (or it can be found on his person).

trait.name: Deadly Poison (Recharges 4-6)
entries: Once in each of his turns, Ekech can coat his blades with special poisons as a bonus action.
Viper's Bite. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} poison damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

Bewildering Toxin. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or be confused until the end of their next turn. On a failure, a target also takes {@damage 3d8} psychic damage, or half as much damage on a success.

Noxious Fumes. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. The condition ends if the target takes damage or by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ekech makes two Falcion or dagger attacks.

action.name: Falcion
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage. On a 18-20, the the target also gains a minor wound, causing it to take {@damage 1d6} slashing damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Ekech regains 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) hit points. He can then move up to his movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The next attack roll or saving throw he makes within the next minute is made with advantage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The electromancer's spellcating ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). They can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Static Electricity
entries: Any creature that damages the electromancer with an attack while within 30 feet of them takes 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) lightning damage. A creature that touches the electromancer against their will takes 10 lightning damage and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The electromancer makes three lightning burst attacks, or makes one lightning burst attack and casts one of his spells, or uses his shocking tendrils (if available).

action.name: Lightning Burst
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) lightning damage, and the target can't use its reaction until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Shocking Tendrils {@recharge 4}
entries: The electromancer channels conductive electrical energies through their body, pushing them outwards. Up to {@dice 1d4 + 2} tendrils form, each striking a random hostile creature within 120 feet of the electromancer. A creature can't be stricken by more than one tendrils. Any stricken target takes {@damage 3d3 + 3} lightning damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw. The DC is equal to 5 + the damage taken. On a failure, a creature is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
Extra Feature: Tesla Coils

The electromancer creates up to 4 tesla coils within 90 feet of it. Each coil is a large object with 50 hit points, immunity to lightning and psychic damage, and a damage threshold of 10. Each coil deals 1d10 lightning damage to each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the coil. Every point of damage dealt is added to a counter. When the counter reaches the hit point maximum of the coil (50), the coil transforms into a lightning elemental (CR 5).
The less coils created, the more damage (and hit points they have). 3 coils: 2d10, 75 hit points. 2 coils: 3d10 and 100 hit points. The elementals created could also be stronger.

Alternatively, the electromancer can choose to create one singular coil that is a huge object with 150 hit points, immunity to lightning and psychic damage, and a damage threshold of 10. When a hostile creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the lightning coil, it must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d10 lightning damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. When the coil's counter has been charged to 150 hit points, it expands into a gargantuan size, with a range of 60 feet, and a levitating effect that allows it to hover 20 feet above the ground. (Measure 60 feet as if the coil was on the ground). The electromancer can use its bonus action to move it up to 20 feet in a direction of his choice, except upwards.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the elite coronian is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the elite coronian instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Impervious {@recharge 5}
entries: Whenever the elite succeeds on a saving throw, it can choose to gain 20 temporary hit points. The elite coronian's next attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage on a hit within the next minute.

trait.name: Aura of Influence
entries: The elite coronian and any creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it have advantage on all saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elite coronian makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Spontaneous Influence
entries: Whenever the elite coronian or a creature within 10 feet of it rolls a die, the elite coronian can use its reaction to make them reroll the die, and use the result of the coronian's choice.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The elven hakushai has advantage on saving throws against spells, other magical effects, and effects that would cause it to be {@condition charmed}.

trait.name: Nimble Fighter
entries: The elven hakushai has a +2 to its AC while its speed is not 0. If it hits a creature with an attack, the hakushai doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity from it for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the elven hakushai deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a sneak attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elven hakushai makes three attacks with one of its weapons. If it scores a critical hit (roll of 19-20), it can make an additional attack with its bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) damage.

bonus.name: Hakushai Target
entries: The hakushai can use its bonus action to mark a creature within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls against the hakushai for 1 minute. Additionally, the hakushai always knows the position of the target if it is within 30 feet of it, or its direction if it isn't, and it can use its Sneak Attack on the target.

bonus.name: Hakushai Aim
entries: As a bonus action, the hakushai can give itself advantage on its next melee attack roll against a marked target within 5 feet of it. It can use this bonus action only if it hasn't moved yet during this turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enforcer makes two club attacks or one crossbow attack.

action.name: Billy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Disciplined Mind
entries: The enforcer has advantage on Mental saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enforcer makes two attacks.

action.name: Enforcer's Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hypnotic Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or come under the effects of the hypnotic pattern spell.

reaction.name: Hypnotic Block
entries: When the enforcer is targeted by a melee attack, he can use his reaction to force to attacker to make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature loses its attack and can't attack the enforcer for the rest of its turn. A creature that is immune to being {@condition charmed} is immune to this effect.

trait.name: Illusory Camouflage
entries: The enforcer can actively camouflage themselves using illusory magic. Doing so requires concentration, and grants them advantage on Dexterity (Stealth checks).

trait.name: Silent Projections
entries: The enforcer can cast the silent image spell at will (spell save {@dc 10}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enforcer makes two club attacks or one crossbow attack. If the enforcer hits the same creature with two club attacks, the creature becomes {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Enforcer's Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Psychic Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must save against the phantasmal force spell ({@dc 13}, no concentration required). Only one creature at a time can be affected by the spell.

trait.name: Strong Physique
entries: The enforcer has advantage on rolls made against being knocked {@condition prone} or moved against his will. The enforcer also has advantage on grapple checks and shove attacks, and can use his bonus action to make a shove attack against a creature he is grappling.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enforcer makes two club attacks or one crossbow attack.

action.name: Enforcer's Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wound Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must make a Strength saving throw.
{@dc 7}: the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
{@dc 10}: the target's speed is halved until the end of their next turn.
{@dc 13}: the target is unaffected.

reaction.name: Grab of Opportunity
entries: Instead of making an attack of opportunity, the enforcer can attempt to grapple a creature.

monster.name: Failed Experiment

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the failed experiment remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a corpse.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The failed experiment has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}. If the failed experiment hits a surprised creature, the hit is a critical hit.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the failed experiment to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the failed experiment drops to 1 hit point instead.

actionHeader: The failed experiment makes two septic claw attacks.

action.name: Septic Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is missing any hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and be infected with the Septic Rot disease. While infected, a creature receives half as much healing it would receive from any source.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The firemaul's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Fire Burst (1/Turn)
entries: Once per turn, when the firemaul hits a creature with an attack, it can make the weapon burst with fire. Every creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take an equal amount of fire damage, taking half as much damage on a success. On a failure, a creature is also knocked {@condition prone} and pushed 5 feet away from the target. On a success, the creature can choose to safely step 5 feet away from the target, without using a reaction. If it doesn't choose to do so, it takes the full damage but isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Maul of Flame
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Afterburn {@recharge 5}
entries: The firemaul flies up to its movement speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it passes within 5 feet of a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke {@recharge 5}
entries: When the firemaul is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of it, it can point its finger at it and cause it to be surrounded by flames. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, taking half as much damage on success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flameseed's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Ignition
entries: Whenever the flameseed deals fire damage to a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be ignited. If a creature takes fire damage as a result of a failed saving throw, it immediately becomes ignited. An ignited creature sheds light in a 10-foot radius and takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage at the start of each of its turns until a creature uses its action to put out the flames.

trait.name: Friend to Flame
entries: If the flameseed takes any fire damage, its AC increases by 5 until the start of its next turn. Additionally, it has advantage on attack rolls against ignited creatures, and ignited creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the flameseed's abilities.

trait.name: Flame Wreath
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the flameseed must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and is ignited. Also, when a creature hits the flameseed with a melee attack, roll {@dice 1d6}. On a 6, each creature within 5 feet of it must make the same saving throw.

action.name: Spontaneous Combustion
entries: The flameseed breathes sparks of ignition in a 30-foot radius around it. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be ignited.

action.name: Stoke the Flames
entries: The flameseed raises its hands and intensifies each flame around it. The flames of each ignited creature within 60 feet of it intensify. Each times the ignited flames intensify, the damage the ignited creature takes at the start of its turn increases by {@dice 1d6}.

reaction.name: Sudden Sear
entries: When the flameseed sees an ignited creature make an attack roll or saving throw, it can use its reaction to cause the flames to flare suddenly. The creature takes its ignition damage and makes the roll with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Innate Flame (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The flameseed uses its spontaneous combustion or it stokes the flames.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Focalor's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can cast the following spells. Focalor casts every spell at 5th level, unless it is of a higher level.

trait.name: Deathvapor Aura
entries: Any enemy creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Focalor must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 8d6} poison damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. A creature that fails this saving throw by 5 or more is also {@condition poisoned}, while a creature that critically fails on this save must spend the entirety of its next turn retching and reeling from the vapors.

If focalor takes more than 50 damage in a single turn, or is dealt a critical hit, he must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or the effect is suspended for 1 round. The DC is equal to half of the damage taken. The DM might determine other ways (such as an ancient scroll against Focalor's powers) that might be able to suspend this effect.

trait.name: Poison Attunement
entries: When Focalor deals poison damage, he can treat immunity to poison as resistance, and ignore resistance to poison damage. Additionally, when a creature within 60 feet of him takes poison damage, he can use his reaction to allow the creature to reroll the damage roll and take the highest of the two rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Focalor makes two ray of sickness attacks.

action.name: Toxic Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of Focalor's next turn. A creature has disadvantage on this saving throw if it is {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Ray of Sickness
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit +12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) poison damage, and on a hit the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution save or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of Focalor's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Focalor makes a ray of sickness attack, or a toxic claw attack (for 2 Legendary Actions).

legendary.name: Activate Poison (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Focalor causes every creature within 120 feet of it that is {@condition poisoned} to take 24 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage. On a successful {@dc 20} Constitution save, a creature takes half as much damage.

legendary.name: Absorb Poison (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Focalor absorbs the poison around him to revitalize himself. Focalor gains 10 temporary hit points for each {@condition poisoned} creature within 5 feet of him (to a max of 30 hit points). Additionally, Focalor can choose to suspend his deathvapor aura in order to gain an extra 20 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Gaiveran is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Gaiveran instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Fierce
entries: When Gaiveran scores a critical hit or reduces a creature to 0 hit points, he can make an additional claw attack.
When Gaiveran hits a creature with an attack, his AC increases by 1 until the start of his next turn.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: Gaiveran has advantage on checks made to track creatures that have half or fewer of their maximum hit points. In addition, Gaiveran can take the dash action as a bonus action if he moves straight toward a creature he is hunting with his blood sense.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Disengage
entries: If Gaiveran hits a creature with an attack, he can take the disengage action as a bonus action that turn.

bonus.name: Dash
entries: Gaiveran can take the dash action as a bonus action if he has fewer than half of his maximum hit points.

reaction.name: Rending Riposte
entries: When Gaiveran is hit by an attack, he can use his reaction to make a Dexterity ability check and reduce the amount of damage he takes by the amount rolled. Any extra hit points become temporary hit points instead.

If Gaiveran reduces an attack's damage to 0, he can immediately make a claw attack against a creature within range. On a hit, he can expend any number of temporary hit points he has gained from this feature in order to deal an equal amount of extra damage with the strike.

trait.name: Frail
entries: If the gakki takes 10 or more bludgeoning damage from an attack, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Mouth Pincers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage. On a hit, the gakki plunges its pincers in the flesh of its target, attaching itself. If the target moves away from the gakki, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage as its flesh is ripped on its way out. A creature can use its action to succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength check in order to safely detach an attached creature.

reaction.name: Flee
entries: When the gakki is targeted by an attack, it can use its reaction to move up to its movement speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it can, it then hides. The attack is avoided, though the attacker doesn't lose their attack action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gallic taurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the attack roll exceeds the target's AC by 5 or more, or the taurus has advantage on the attack roll, the target also gains a minor piercing wound ({@dice 1d4}).

action.name: Charged Tail
