spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zalia's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 19}). She can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The zalia can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless she wishes to be. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects, and she takes half damage from spells.

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) force damage, and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is either pushed 10 feet away from Zalia, or it is unable to cast spells until the end of its next turn (her choice).

action.name: Arcane Siphon {@recharge 4}
entries: Zalia chooses up to 6 creatures she can see within 60 feet of her to make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 8d8} force damage, or half as much damage on a success. On a failure, a creature also loses a random spell slot it has, or if it has no spell slots, it loses {@dice 1d4} hit dice. Zalia then gains 10 temporary hit points for each creature that failed its save, to a maximum of 30 temporary hit points.

action.name: Summon Creature (1/day)
entries: Zalia summons a creature of her choice from the following list: aberration, celestial, construct, elemental, fey, fiend, undead or dragon. The creature appears in an unoccupied space within 90 feet of her, and has the statistics of a spirit of its according type and appears as if cast by an 8th level spell. The creature lasts until it is reduced to 0 hit points, or until Zalia loses concentration on it twice (as if concentrating on a spell). This does not prevent Zalia from concentrating on other spells.

bonus.name: Arcane Step
entries: Zalia teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her. Any creatures within 5 feet of the point she leaves must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and become shocked until the end of their next turn. A shocked creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and can't take any reactions.

reaction.name: Counterspell
entries: When Zalia sees a creature casting a spell, she can use her reaction to force it to make a DC19 saving throw with its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the casting of the spell fails, and Zalia gains temporary hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. If Zalia already has temporary hit points, these hit points are added to the total.

reaction.name: Arcane Barrier
entries: As a reaction to being targeted by an attack, Zalia erects a force field around her. Until the start of her next turn, she has a +5 bonus to her AC and she can't be physically touched, making her immune to spells with a range of touch or being {@condition grappled}.
If an attack misses her while her barrier is active, the attacker takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage and is pushed 5 feet away from her.

trait.name: Steady Grip
entries: If Zilk is grappling a creature with its robotic arm, the creature can't escape the grapple by physically overpowering Zilk, unless its Strength score is higher than Zilk's.

While Zilk is grappling a creature with his robotic arm, he can't use it to make attacks. Instead, Zilk can use up to one of his attacks during his turn to squeeze the creature. The creature immediately takes half as much damage as it would take on a hit.

trait.name: Arcane Instability
entries: If Zilk takes 30 or more damage in a single turn, he must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or an arcane surge appears. The DC is equal to 10 + (the total damage he took divided by 10). If Zilk is reduced to 0 by that damage, he automatically fails the saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Zilk makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, Zilk can choose to grapple a creature instead of deal damage to it.

action.name: Robotic Arm (Cooldown 1)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 15 feet away from Zilk and knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Reinforce {@recharge 4}
entries: Zilk activates his implants, granting him resistance to bludgeoning, slashing or piercing damage until the start of his next turn. Zilk can't do so if he is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

reaction.name: Metallic Parry
entries: If Zilk's robotic arm is free, Zilk can use his reaction to raise it in order to stave off a successful melee weapon attack. Zilk reduces the damage he takes by {@dice 3d12}. If the attack was an unarmed strike, and the damage is reduced to 0, the attacker takes bludgeoning damage equal to the remainder of the roll.

legendary.name: Kick
entries: Zilk makes an unarmed strike attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the target is pushed back up to 5 feet from Zilk, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Second Wind
entries: If Zilk doesn't have any enemies within 5 feet of him, he can spend a hit die ({@dice d8}) and regain hit points equal to the roll + 3.
